A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Director Rian Johnson's approach to Star Wars is unconventional\, yet is right.  I haven't clapped and cheered so loudly in a theater since The Force Awakens. Johnson gives us the Star Wars we love\, while also including fresh elements never seen before in the franchise. Truly a Star Wars for a new generation. Fans with specific expectations might not like The Last Jedi\, because Johnson's narrative is so unexcepting.
